sender.title: Sender Message
sender.pharagraph_1: You can use this sender to send a WhatsApp's message to a person without you must to save the contact number in your phone.
sender.pharagraph_2: For this, you must to have install the WhatsApp app in your phone or have a active session in WhatsApp web in your browser.
sender.note: We not collect any information about your message or the destinatary, we only help you doing a correct redirection to the WhatsApp app.
sender.msg_error_message: Please enter valid values in order to send the message.
